title: Dragon Trainer Lulu Cake

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: Was girlfriend's birthday and thought a cake of her main would be cool...

replies.body: Looks like very thick, overly sweet icing, then again cant really make decorative cakes unless you do.

I have a cousin who makes cakes like this professionally, and if I recall correctly, it's essentially a super tough filler kind of icing that isn't that sweet. Sweeter than the cake itself still though not by much, and has the texture of hard icing essentially. Of course, that would vary depending on who makes it but my experience is that it isn't the same kind of hard icing you'd use if you were just icing a plain cake.
